title: Replace heart, flower, and balloon visual assets with high-quality recognizable graphics

requirements.summary: Replace the heart graphic in FloatingHearts with a high-quality, clearly recognizable heart image asset while preserving all animation properties
acceptanceCriteria: The heart graphic is clearly and immediately recognizable as a proper heart shape
The graphic is sharp, smooth, and visually premium with no distortion or abstract appearance
All FloatingHearts animation parameters (count, speed, opacity, size, placement, z-index, distribution) are identical to before
No theme colors, background, or any other UI element is changed

file_operations.description: Update the image import or src reference to use the newly generated heart asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/heart-graphic.dim_120x120.png. Replace the current heart-float.dim_64x64.png reference with the new high-quality heart graphic. Ensure all animation logic, count, speed, opacity, size variation, placement, z-index, and distribution remain exactly unchanged.

requirements.summary: Replace the flower graphic in FlowerRain with a high-quality, clearly recognizable flower image asset while preserving all animation properties
acceptanceCriteria: The flower graphic clearly shows a flower with visible, properly shaped petals
The graphic is aesthetically pleasing, realistic, and premium-looking
All FlowerRain animation parameters (count, timing, speed, placement, z-index, intensity logic per stage) are identical to before
No theme colors, background, or any other UI element is changed

file_operations.description: Update the image import or src reference to use the newly generated flower asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/flower-graphic.dim_120x120.png. Replace the current flower-petal.dim_48x48.png reference with the new high-quality flower graphic. Ensure all animation logic, count, timing, speed, placement, z-index, and intensity logic remain exactly unchanged.

requirements.summary: Replace the balloon graphic in BalloonAnimation with a high-quality, clearly recognizable balloon image asset while preserving all animation properties
acceptanceCriteria: The balloon graphic clearly shows a proper balloon shape with a visible string at the bottom
The graphic is visually attractive and immediately identifiable as a balloon
All BalloonAnimation parameters (count, speed, upward movement, placement, z-index, intensity balance per stage) are identical to before
No theme colors, background, or any other UI element is changed

file_operations.description: Update the image import or src reference to use the newly generated balloon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/balloon-graphic.dim_80x140.png. Replace the current balloon.dim_80x120.png reference with the new high-quality balloon graphic. Ensure all animation logic, count, speed, upward movement, placement, z-index, and intensity balance remain exactly unchanged.
